event.description: Jacoby Ellsbury pops out to second baseman Robinson Cano.
Dustin Pedroia walks.
David Ortiz doubles (8) on a line drive to right fielder Nick Swisher. Dustin Pedroia to 3rd.
With Kevin Youkilis batting, passed ball by Jose Molina, Dustin Pedroia scores. David Ortiz to 3rd.
Kevin Youkilis strikes out on a foul tip.
J. D. Drew walks.
Jason Bay pops out to first baseman Mark Teixeira in foul territory.
Mike Lowell homers (6) on a fly ball to left field.

Jason Bay singles on a ground ball to shortstop Derek Jeter. Drew to 2nd.
Mike Lowell singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Nick Swisher. J. D. Drew scores. Jason Bay to 3rd.
Jason Varitek grounds out softly to first baseman Mark Teixeira.
Nick Green flies out to center fielder Melky Cabrera.
